data.subject: A Day In The Life Of Maurice Haylett
data.lyric:
The little man who rang
 And danced while he sang
 Sits in the back of my head
 
 He wears Navy Blue

data.subject: Limits
data.lyric:
If your world is big enough for you
 Don't go spoiling it for someone else
